name: 3-tier-serverless-app
description: 3-tier serverless Pokemon application with React frontend, Lambda backend, and DynamoDB

scripts.install-all: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../database && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev-backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 local_server.py
scripts.deploy-database: cd database && source venv/bin/activate && cdk deploy
scripts.deploy-backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && cdk deploy
scripts.deploy-frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && cdk deploy
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-database && npm run deploy-backend && npm run deploy-frontend
scripts.destroy-all: cd database && source venv/bin/activate && cdk destroy && cd ../backend && source venv/bin/activate && cdk destroy && cd ../frontend && cdk destroy
